Creator: TRUE
Name: typos
Description: The goal of typos is to provide a flexible warning when commonly mis-typed functions are called. Functions with typing errors will still be evaluated and a warning will be output. It also provides the user with a convenient function to define their own typos.

Creator: TRUE
Name: mutils
Description: The goal of mutils is to provide useful functions to make data processing smoother. Most functions contained here are "nifty", rather than "innovative".

Creator: TRUE
Name: mpipe
Description: The mpipe package is designed to add extra functionality to the pipeline process in tidyverse style R usage
